title: Неотправленное письмо
overview: Olga, the heroine of the series, is almost thirty, and she still has not met her knight. All her girlfriends have been married for a long time, and are busy raising children. Over time, the girl stops communicating with her friends, as she feels loneliness even more. One of the girls persuades her to go to the fortuneteller. Vorozhka predicts she will soon meet a rich handsome man.Soon the prophecy comes true. The poor thing meets a charming businessman and marries him. But plans for a happy family life do not come true. Her luxury country house feels like a cage. After the wedding, the husband has changed a lot, and Olga does not see from him neither tenderness nor love. She soon begins to realize that her marriage was a mistake.
